description: Kate Costain says chief executives have "too much power" as she steps down from Manx politics.
title: Kate Costain: Retiring MHK hits out at Isle of Man's top civil servants
title_page: Kate Costain: Retiring MHK hits out at Isle of Man's top civil servants - BBC News
maintext: In an open letter, she said that while she found "99% of civil servants" to be "excellent... well motivated and hard working", the chief secretary and his chief officers group "wield more power than is rightfully theirs".
